abstract: United Nations electoral observers condemn presidential election in Burundi, noting restrictions on news media and curtailed freedom of expression and assembly.
lead_paragraph: The observers’ preliminary statement notes that the news media were restricted and freedom of expression and assembly was “severely impaired.”

headline.main: Burundi: U.N. Observers Call Presidential Vote Flawed
headline.print_headline: Africa; Burundi: U.N. Observers Call Environment for Vote Flawed

snippet: The observers’ preliminary statement notes that the news media were restricted and freedom of expression and assembly was “severely impaired.”
